column2: we went with sandwiches. I got the reuben
column3: and the boyfriend got the Los Drowned. The reuben was delicious; there was kimchi on the reuben. KIMCHI ON THE REUBEN! It was a spectacular deliciousness. Boyfriend was a little disappointed with the Los Drowned. He enjoyed it
column4: but wasn't impressed. It was basically a fancier version of an Italian beef sandwich
column5: which by no means is a bad thing
column6: but didn't really send him over the top.
